LanguageData.VQEA_AncientWorkshop.label: ancient workshop
LanguageData.VQEA_AncientWorkshop.description: An ancient work station for assembling machinery like guns and ammunition, smithing non-mechanical weapons and tools, or breaking down dead mechanoids.
LanguageData.VqEA_AncientCookingStation.label: ancient cooking station
LanguageData.VqEA_AncientCookingStation.description: An electrically-powered stove with an attached countertop for preparing meals. It can also be used for butchering dead creatures into pieces of raw meat.
LanguageData.VQEA_AncientGreenbed.label: ancient greenbed
LanguageData.VQEA_AncientGreenbed.description: A small but very efficient artificial greenbed for growing plants. The nutrients pumps must work continuously; the plants will die if power is cut.
